channel.title: How To I Encrypt A Script?
channel.description:
Does any one know how to encrypt a scar script?
I was just wondering how to lol so any help would be appreciated

item.title: How To I Encrypt A Script?
item.dc:creator: @Eduard111 Eduard111
item.description:
@Eduard111 wrote:

You want to protect it from leechers ? =p
If u do , Just Make enough variables that they are crazy =p
or trying deleting x,y:integer; away

~Ed

item.title: How To I Encrypt A Script?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:5, topic:8769”]No, because he is busy and since his site has closed down (which held all of the info about encryption, verified scripts etc.) he cant do it anymore.

And he held the secret very close to him. He is the only person who can do it now.

If you want an obfus, Ruler Eric made one. I think its at Impsoft.net. Otherwise i could help you out[/quote]
YAY STARY IS BACK!!!

They’re ways to protect your script from being copied.

earth:

if your smart enough convert a scar script to delphi then complie it

didn’t think that was possible since correct me if i am wrgon but scar plugins can’t access scar functions?

Also download my last realese of the obfucator.
http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?action=tpmod;dl=item2

but i think star has improved upon on some more.

item.title: How To I Encrypt A Script?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

No, because he is busy and since his site has closed down (which held all of the info about encryption, verified scripts etc.) he cant do it anymore.

And he held the secret very close to him. He is the only person who can do it now.

If you want an obfus, Ruler Eric made one. I think its at Impsoft.net. Otherwise i could help you out
